reviewText: Nice quality.  Arrived ahead of schedule.
All great !!!!! Yang Jwing Ming is a best master !!!!
The video series have a clear, concise step-by-step approach for each application/moves/locks.  Great for beginners and good review advanced practitioners.
In short, if you buy this, you'll want the whole 12-part set. Recommended buy for anyone looking to master joint locking techniques.

A wealth of information is provided on the Grappling aspects of Chin-Na.  The instruction is detailed and the material is easy to follow (so long as you have a willing partner).  My only criticism is that the application of techniques is direct and does not incorporate Chin-na striking or distractionary measures which can be very helpful in applying grappling techniques.  Still, I really liked the material and highly recommend it.
